attributes.description:
Welcome to Cars.Com2, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges. We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. Visit our Full Range of vehicles at Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

At our Branch we are proud to introduce for sale this immaculate 2018 Audi A3 1.0 Tfsi. It features, Aircon, Power Steering, Airbags, Aux, Bluetooth, Radio/CD, Cloth seats, Multifunction Steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Cruise Control, Central Locking and Mags. 

Nation Wide Delivery 15 years successful track record, trusted dealer with a selection of 50 cars under one roof. First payment in 60 days Everybody knows that Cars.Com2 rules MOTOR TOWN. Enquire now for friendly, professional, efficient and fast service. Its easy to do business with Cars.Com2.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252412. Balance of 5 year factory warranty.
Balance of 5 year or 100 000km factory service plan, whichever comes first.
Full service history and spare keys.
17-inch alloy wheels.
Reverse camera with parking sensors, Infotainment system with Bluetooth, electric windows, climate control, power steering, central locking, security system, airbags, cruise control.
Mercedes tireless pursuit to deliver pure driving pleasure means that every element from design to technology, safety to performance has been enhanced to new levels. We believe a car should stir emotions, making your heart race before you get behind the wheel. Even when standing still, a Mercedes conveys an exciting sense of motion that makes you want to drive it.
We do a 101 quality check on every vehicle and we do Roadworthy upon delivery.
We offer in-house finance with all major banks.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.
T's and C's apply.
Errors and omissions Reserved.
